settings.liquid:
Headphone Zone Certified Unboxed Units

Unboxed units are as good as new products with the product's packaging being unavailable. These products give you the same satisfaction of new products - but at down-to-earth prices. Usually, the product's packaging may have gotten damaged in transit. Customers use a product once or twice and then return it with opened up packaging.

Customer Returns

Returned headphones are fully functional products that have left the warehouse and therefore can no longer be sold as new as their packaging has been opened. The product may have been used once or twice by the customer who returned it.

Transit Damages

Sometimes we receive headphones in damaged packaging due to shipping accidents. These are brand new headphones with cosmetic flaws on the packaging.



Save Upto 15%

Since you won't get the original packaging, we give you a good discount compared to a new headphone.

Professionally Inspected

A thorough inspection means you receive a 100% working headphone with no sound output issues.

Original Warranty

All unboxed headphones carry the same warranty period as a brand new headphone would.

Unbiased Customer Service

We have the same Headphone Zone customer support experience for Unboxed Products or new products.

Unchanged Replacement Policy

Received a defective Unboxed unit? Return it under our Replacement Policy.

All Original Accessories

The unboxed headphones itself comes with all original accessories.

settings.text: Headphone Zone Collaborates With Lypertek To Reinvent The PurePlay Z3

settings.content:
In the 13 years since Headphone Zone started, with over a million headphones shipped all across India, the Headphone Zone name and logo never featured on any Headphone. Headphone Zone is a trusted destination for audiophiles in India, but never known for making headphones. It never made sense. But that changes with this product.

Introducing the PurePlay Z3 from Headphone Zone and Lypertek. It's the first collaboration Headphone Zone has done with any brand and manufacturer from around the world that's made for the audiophiles of India. The PurePlay Z3 is simply the best-sounding true wireless earbuds for audiophiles. It may not have all the bells and whistles in terms of specs, tech and features, but from our incredible collection of the world’s finest headphones, we know that the PurePlay Z3 simply sounds amazing for True Wireless Earbuds.

settings.liquid: NOTE: The Lypertek X Headphone Zone PurePlay Z3 does not offer app support.

settings.title: Enjoy Accurate Sound With 6mm Graphene Drivers
settings.content:
Sound is the ultimate driving force of the Lypertek X Headphone Zone PurePlay Z3 Truly wireless earbuds. After years of research and know-how in the audio industry, they have developed a unique sound signature for PurePlay Z3. All this is achieved by the exclusively tuned 6mm Graphene drivers that deliver clean, balanced and powerful audio with a wide sound stage. Now you can enjoy the exceptional sound without a cable connection for a truly immersive experience.

NOTE: The Lypertek X Headphone Zone Z3 does not offer app support.

settings.title: Bluetooth 5.2 Connectivity With aptX Transmission
settings.content: The Lypertek X Headphone Zone PurePlay Z3 True Wireless earphones, which feature the most recent Qualcomm processor, support advanced Bluetooth 5.2 to offer a stable wireless connection with increased range. Additionally, it supports the high-fidelity audio codecs Qualcomm aptX, AAC, and SBC, enabling wireless transmission.

settings.title: 10 Hours of Music Playback + 70 Hours on the Case
settings.content: The Lypertek X Headphone Zone PurePlay Z3 earbuds offer 10 hours of playback on a single charge to guarantee that your music never stops. The included stylish fabric case can charge the PurePlay Z3 earphones 7 times, extending the playtime to a staggering 80 hours. Most wireless earbuds offer between 4 to 8 hours of playback time on a single charge. However, PurePlay Z3 offers a battery life that lets you remain worry-free for your earbuds running out of juice.

settings.title: Take the Pureplay Z3 Anywhere With IPX7 Rating
settings.content: The Lypertek X Headphone Zone PurePlay Z3 earbuds have an IPX7 waterproof rating that shields the internal components from damage caused by perspiration and rain, making them ready for any trip. Use the PurePlay Z3 earphones with complete confidence while working out, running, or simply on your commute.

settings.title: Pureplay Control App And LDX Audio
settings.content: Now you can enjoy compatibility with the newly developed PureControl app, which offers access to the high-quality 7-band EQ, LDX Audio mode, Hear Through mode, button customisation, Find My Earbuds and much more. The new LDX Audio mode adds a new dimension to the listening experience with a designated audio profile developed for the PurePlay Z3. The app is available for iOS and Android.

settings.title: Superior call quality with Qualcomm cVc 8.0 Microphone
settings.content: Lypertek X Headphone Zone PurePlay Z3 suppresses external noise and echo. It comes with a Qualcomm cVc 8.0 microphone for noise cancelling, allowing for a superior call-quality experience. It is designed to offer a reliable calling experience. Enjoy crystal-clear calls as the PurePlay Z3 suppresses the surrounding noise so that the person at the other end can hear you without any unnecessary interference.

The Lypertek x Headphone Zone PurePlay Z3 supports upto 10 hours of music playback and upto 70 hours on the case. It also supports wireless charging using the Qi standard, adding to the overall convenience.

It is compatible with audio codecs such as Qualcomm aptX, AAC, and SBC, allowing wireless transmission. The Lypertek X Headphone Zone PurePlay Z3 can operate wirelessly within a range of up to 10 meters.

settings.title: Type-C Input
settings.content: The Lypertek X Headphone Zone PurePlay Z3 uses a Type-C cable for charging the case.

settings.title: Easy Button Control
settings.content: The Lypertek X Headphone Zone PurePlay Z3 enables easy button control, allowing you to control call and end calls as well as music play/stop, volume up/down, next track/previous track, and volume up/down.

settings.title: Charging Case
settings.content: A quick charge of 15 minutes gives 2 hours of playtime.

settings.title: Accessories To Get You Started
settings.content:
1. Charging Case
2. S,M,L Silicone Tips (1 pair per size)
3. Flexfit Foam Tips
4. USB Type-C Cable
5. Quick Start Manual

Editor's Choice Award
Techradar
February, 2023

Recommended Products
MobileTech Talk
October, 2019

Best Budget TWS
Headfonia
December, 2020

The Lypertek PurePlay Z3 2.0 TWS takes advantage of the Qualcomm built-in cVc 8.0 noise reduction system that reduces echo, wind noise and works on a negative feed-forward and feedback system that negates microphone sound quality.
The PurePlay Z3 2.0 are another excellent pair of affordable true wireless from Lypertek, with the new app and features extending its lifespan and adding more value than before.
Lypertek continues to punch above its weight and outside of its pricing bracket with the PurePlay Z3 2.0 true wireless earbuds, a stellar-sounding and well-priced package.
These earphones keep the main qualities of their predecessors intact: great technical ability, superb detail, solid connectivity, superb comfort and IPX7 certification, plus very long battery life.
The sound quality is fantastic for a more affordable pair of true wireless earbuds and the battery life is outstanding so you’ll very rarely need to charge them.
The PurePlay Z3 are very impressive, especially considering their sub £100 price point. Offering up a smooth and detailed sound signature that is well balanced yet slightly full.

settings.value_7:
Max 10 Hours* + 70 Hours Playing Time
(*Volume 50% On SBC)
settings.value_8: 15 Minutes Charging For 2 Hours Play Time
settings.value_10: Wireless charging, Easy button control, Phone calls, Voice assistant calls
settings.value_15:
WHAT YOU WILL GET
1. Lypertek X Headphone Zone PurePlay Z3
2. Charging Case
3. S, M, L Silicone Tips (1 pair per size)
4. Flexfit Foam Tips
5. USB Type-C Cable
6. Quick Start Manual
WHAT YOU WILL NOT GET
1. Original Packaging of Lypertek X Headphone Zone PurePlay Z3
